articles.title: Bavuma admits losing Nortje a hammer blow for Cricket World Cup, but backs Coetzee to fill void
articles.description: Captain Temba Bavuma says the Proteas will miss Anrich Nortje's experience and leadership at the World Cup in India but has backed Gerald Coetzee to step up.
articles.content:
• Going to the Cricket World Cup without paceman Anrich Nortje is a massive blow to the Proteas, skipper Temba Bavuma admits.
  • Bavuma, though, is confident that Gerald Coetzee can fill t… [+3181 chars]

articles.author: Marium Ali
articles.title: ICC Cricket World Cup 2023 explained in map and charts
articles.description: India is set to host the 13th edition of the ICC’s Men’s Cricket World Cup from October 5 to November 19, 2023.
articles.content: The 13th edition of the ICC Mens Cricket World Cup is set to take place from October 5 to November 19, 2023, in India. The one-day international (ODI) cricket tournament has been held every four year… [+3347 chars]

articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
